Name: Slash
Description: A quick strike with the sword.

Name: Piercing Arrow
Description: A swift and precise arrow shot.

Name: Dark Slash
Description: A sinister strike infused with malevolent energy.

Name: Grandma’s Wrath
Description: Unleash the culinary rage of an angry grandma: flaming ladles rain from above!

Name: Dramatic Hair Flip
Description: With a theatrical toss of your hair, you blind enemies with sheer vanity.

Name: Existential Uppercut
Description: A punch that strikes both the body… and the enemy’s sense of purpose.

Name: Apocalypse Burrito
Description: You wrap destiny itself in a cosmic tortilla. Whoever takes a bite… implodes.
